title: The Week of Triumph: The Adventures of Frank Sanders
summary: Frank Sanders, a 51-year-old superhero with hobbies in training and negotiating, uses his unique skills to thwart a city-threatening crisis over the course of a week.
summaryGerman: Frank Sanders, ein 51-jähriger Superheld mit Hobbys im Training und Verhandeln, nutzt seine einzigartigen Fähigkeiten, um eine die Stadt bedrohende Krise im Laufe einer Woche zu vereiteln.
summaryDutch: Frank Sanders, een 51-jarige superheld met hobby's in training en onderhandelen, gebruikt zijn unieke vaardigheden om een crisis die de stad bedreigt gedurende een week af te wenden.
summaryFrench: Frank Sanders, un super-héros de 51 ans avec des hobbies dans l'entraînement et la négociation, utilise ses compétences uniques pour déjouer une crise menaçant la ville au cours d'une semaine.

story.text: Frank discovers an eerie signal emanating from city hall that threatens to control the minds of the city's populace.
Using his negotiation skills, Frank convinces an old rival to help him investigate the source of the signal.
They uncover a hidden lab where a disgruntled scientist has been developing the technology.
Frank trains intensively to resist the mind control while planning a way to dismantle the setup.
With a carefully orchestrated attack, Frank manages to destroy the mind control device and free his city.
The city celebrates Frank as a hero. He spends a peaceful day reflecting on the week's events.
During a quiet negotiation session, Frank secures an agreement to prevent future misuse of similar technologies.

moral: Even in the face of great adversity, diplomacy and preparedness can save the day.
ending: And thus, Frank Sanders once again proved that age and wisdom often triumph where brute strength does not.
